sources.title: American Animals | FULL MOVIE | 2018 | Evan Peters, Art Heist
sources.description:
The unbelievable but true story of four young men who brazenly attempt to execute one of the most audacious art heists in U.S. history.

Evan Peters
Barry Keoghan
Blake Jenner
Jared Abrahamson
Udo Kier
Ann Dowd

2018
Directed by Bart Layton

sources.title: American Animals | FULL MOVIE | True Crime Story
sources.description:
The unbelievable but true story of the Transylvania University book heist, during which four young men brazenly attempted to execute one of the most audacious art heists in U.S. history. Starring Evan Peters and Barry Keoghan.

#truestory #movie #truecrime #crime #basedontruestory #evanpeters #barrykeoghan #heist #real #crimedrama #art #artheist #unbelievable #crimemovies #kentucky #college #university #library #bizarre #transylvania #transylvaniauniversity #freemoviesonline #fullmoviefree

metadata.Plot: In this crime drama, four bright and well-off college students in Kentucky plot to steal some rare books from their university's Special Collections Library in a misguided quest for personal glory. Based on the story, the film includes interviews with the foursome who attempted the bizarre heist. Starring Barry Keoghan, Evan Peters, Blake Jenner, Jared Abrahamson and Ann Dowd.
metadata.Writer: Bart Layton, Jon Croker, Peter Straughan
metadata.Actors: Spencer Reinhard, Warren Lipka, Eric Borsuk
